contest-event.event-date:
Jan. 18, 2015 D Butlins Mineworkers (Championship Section)
Butlins Mineworkers (Championship Section) 1 Set Test and Entertainments Contest Butlins Mineworkers butlins-mineworkers-championship-section
Championship
Facets of the Heart
Butlins Skegness (Centre Stage), Skegness, Lincolnshire, England, UK Saturday Draw: 12 noon Commence (Saturday): At conclusion of Fourth Section Test Piece Adjudicators: Stephen Roberts & Michael Fowles Sunday Draw: Made on Saturday evening Commence: 11.00am Entertainment Adjudicators: Stephen Roberts & Chad Shoopman
Placing on set work takes precedent in the event of a tie.
Highest Placed Mining Band: Thoresby Colliery (Leigh Baker) Most Entertaining Band: Friary Guildford Best Bass section: Friary Guildford Geoff Dove Soloist Award: David Childs (Flowers)
Jan. 21, 2014, 9:35 a.m. Jan. 21, 2015, 2:46 p.m.
1 Flowers Band Paul Holland
2 The GUS Band Adam Cooke
